short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check PESCO online bill. Enter reference number and and see your PESCO wapda bill now.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check PESCO Bills Online. Want to check the duplicate bills? Get duplicate copy of your Pesco Bills now. This extension is developed for the consumers to check PESCO Bills Online Wapda, download duplicate pesco bill, and/or print the bill. 

Consumers from Peshawar, Swat, Bannu, Hazara, Swabi and Mardan cities can use this extension to download or check or print their bills online if they have to check their electricity bill amount and due date.
